00026    StructureFactorGrid::StructureFactorGrid(System& system) 
00027     : StructureFactor(system),
00028       hMin_(0),
00029       hMax_(0),
00030       nStar_(0),
00031       lattice_(Triclinic),
00032       isInitialized_(false)
00033    {}
00034 
00036    void StructureFactorGrid::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00037    {
00038 
00039       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00040 
00041       // Read parameters
00042       readInterval(in);
00043       readOutputFileName(in);
00044       read<int>(in, "nMode", nMode_);
00045       modes_.allocate(nMode_, nAtomType_);
00046       readDMatrix<double>(in, "modes", modes_, nMode_, nAtomType_);
00047       read<int>(in, "hMin", hMin_);
00048       read<int>(in, "hMax", hMax_);
00049       read<Util::LatticeSystem>(in, "lattice", lattice_);
00050 
00051       // Allocate wavevectors arrays
00052       if (hMin_ != 0) {
00053          nWave_     = (2*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 1) + 1 )*(2*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 1) + 1)*(2*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 1) + 1);
00054       } else {
00055          nWave_     = (2*hMax_ + 1)*(2*hMax_ + 1)*(2*hMax_ + 1);
00056       }
00057       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00058       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00059       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_, nMode_);
00060       structureFactors_.allocate(nWave_, nMode_);
00061 
00062       int i, j, h, k, l, m;
00063       IntVector g;
00064 
00065       // Cubic Symmetry
00066       if (lattice_ == Cubic) {
00067 
00068          nStar_ = (hMax_ - hMin_ + 1 )*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 2)*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 3)/6;
00069          starIds_.allocate(nStar_);
00070          starSizes_.allocate(nStar_);
00071    
00072          // Create cubic point group
00073          PointGroup group;
00074          PointSymmetry a, b, c;
00075 
00076          a.R(0,1) =  1;
00077          a.R(1,0) =  1;
00078          a.R(2,2) =  1;
00079    
00080          b.R(0,0) = -1;
00081          b.R(1,1) =  1;
00082          b.R(2,2) =  1;
00083    
00084          c.R(0,1) =  1;
00085          c.R(1,2) =  1;
00086          c.R(2,0) =  1;
00087    
00088          group.add(c);
00089          group.add(b);
00090          group.add(a);
00091          group.makeCompleteGroup();
00092    
00093          // Create grid of wavevectors
00094          FSArray<IntVector, 48> star;
00095          i = 0;
00096          j = 0;
00097          for (h = hMin_; h <= hMax_; ++h) {
00098             g[0] = h;
00099             for (k = hMin_; k <= h; ++k) {
00100                g[1] = k;
00101                for (l = hMin_; l <= k; ++l) {
00102                   g[2] = l;
00103                   starIds_[i] = j;
00104                   group.makeStar(g, star);
00105                   starSizes_[i] = star.size();
00106                   for (m = 0; m < star.size(); ++m) {
00107                      waveIntVectors_[j] = star[m];
00108                      ++j;
00109                   }
00110                   ++i;
00111                }
00112             }
00113          }
00114          if (i != nStar_) {
00115             UTIL_THROW("Error");
00116          } 
00117          if (j != nWave_) {
00118             UTIL_THROW("Error");
00119          } 
00120       } else if (lattice_ == Tetragonal) {
00121 
00122          nStar_ = (hMax_ - hMin_ + 1 )*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 1)*(hMax_ - hMin_ + 2)/2;
00123          starIds_.allocate(nStar_);
00124          starSizes_.allocate(nStar_);
00125          // Create tetragonal point group
00126          PointGroup group;
00127          PointSymmetry a, b, c;
00128 
00129          a.R(0,0) =  1;
00130          a.R(1,2) =  1;
00131          a.R(2,1) =  1;
00132    
00133          b.R(0,0) =  -1;
00134          b.R(1,1) =  1;
00135          b.R(2,2) =  1;
00136    
00137          c.R(0,0) =  1;
00138          c.R(1,1) =  -1;
00139          c.R(2,2) =  1;
00140 
00141          group.add(c);
00142          group.add(b);
00143          group.add(a);
00144          group.makeCompleteGroup();
00145    
00146          // Create grid of wavevectors
00147          FSArray<IntVector, 16> star;
00148          i = 0;
00149          j = 0;
00150          for (h = hMin_; h <= hMax_; ++h) {
00151             g[0] = h;
00152             for (k = hMin_; k <= hMax_; ++k) {
00153                g[1] = k;
00154                for (l = hMin_; l <= k; ++l) {
00155                   g[2] = l;
00156                   starIds_[i] = j;
00157                   group.makeStar(g, star);
00158                   starSizes_[i] = star.size();
00159                   for (m = 0; m < star.size(); ++m) {
00160                      waveIntVectors_[j] = star[m];
00161                      ++j;
00162                   }
00163                   ++i;
00164                }
00165             }
00166          }
00167          if (i != nStar_) {
00168             UTIL_THROW("Error");
00169          } 
00170          if (j != nWave_) {
00171             UTIL_THROW("Error");
00172          } 
00173       }
00174 
00175       // Clear accumulators
00176       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00177          for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00178             structureFactors_(i, j) = 0.0;
00179          }
00180       }
00181 
00182       maximumValue_.allocate(Samples);
00183       maximumWaveIntVector_.allocate(Samples);
00184       maximumQ_.allocate(Samples);
00185    
00186       nSample_ = 0;
00187 
00188       isInitialized_ = true;
00189    }
00190 
00191    void StructureFactorGrid::setup() 
00192    {}

00194    void StructureFactorGrid::output() 
00195    {
00196       double  value, average, size;
00197       int     i, j, k, m, n;
00198 
00199       // Echo parameters to a log file
00200       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00201       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00202       outputFile_.close();
00203 
00204       // Output structure factors to one file
00205       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00206 
00207       // Loop over waves to output structure factor
00208       for (i = 0; i < nStar_; ++i) {
00209          size = starSizes_[i];
00210 
00211          #if 0
00212          // Output individual waves in star
00213          k = starIds_[i];
00214          for (m = 0; m < size; ++m) {
00215             for (n = 0; n < Dimension; ++n) {
00216                outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[k][n], 5);
00217             }
00218             outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[k].abs(), 20, 8);
00219             for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00220                value = structureFactors_(k, j)/double(nSample_);
00221                outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 20, 8);
00222             }
00223             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00224             ++k;
00225          }
00226          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00227          #endif
00228 
00229          k = starIds_[i];
00230          for (n = 0; n < Dimension; ++n) {
00231             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[k][n], 5);
00232          }
00233          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[k].abs(), 20, 8);
00234          for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00235             k = starIds_[i];
00236             average = 0.0;
00237             for (m = 0; m < size; ++m) {
00238                 value = structureFactors_(k, j)/double(nSample_);
00239                 average += value;
00240                 ++k;
00241             }
00242             average = average/double(size);
00243             outputFile_ << Dbl(average, 20, 8);
00244          }
00245          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00246 
00247       }
00248       outputFile_.close();
00249 
00250       // Outputs history of maximum structure factors
00251       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName("_max.dat"), outputFile_);
00252       for (int i = 0; i < nSample_; ++i) {
00253          outputFile_ << maximumWaveIntVector_[i];
00254          outputFile_ << Dbl(maximumQ_[i], 20, 8);
00255          outputFile_ << Dbl(maximumValue_[i], 20, 8);
00256          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00257       }
00258       outputFile_.close();
00259                                                                   
00260       #if 0
00261       // Output each structure factor to a separate file
00262       std::string suffix;
00263       int         typeId;
00264       for (j = 0; j < nMode_; ++j) {
00265 
00266          // Construct file suffix for this structure factor
00267          suffix = std::string(".");
00268          for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) {
00269             typeId = atomTypeIdPairs_[j][k];
00270             if (typeId < 0) {
00271                suffix += std::string("A");
00272             } else {
00273                suffix += toString(typeId);
00274             }
00275          }
00276          suffix += std::string(".dat");
00277 
00278          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(suffix), outputFile_);
00279 
00280          // Loop over waves to output structure factor
00281 
00282          outputFile_.close();
00283       }
00284       #endif
00285 
00286    }
